website_summaries.verdict: At 14.5", Camille is smaller than the average AG doll, but this size makes her perfect for younger girls.
cons: Excellent quality but expensive for a doll of this size

customer_reviews.title: Best quality doll I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I seriously recommend if you have the money to buy this doll. Her hair is amazing , falls beautifully, has the most cutest little features and it’s extremely durable. Would buy this line again with no thought ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Mummy

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful doll. I'm going to order the mermaid costume ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter asked for a doll for her birthday. I wasn't aware the Wellie wishers doll was an American girl doll for ages 5 to 8. A beautiful doll. I'm going to order the mermaid costume to go with it for an after birthday present. She loves her doll. Its really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jill L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: She's just as beautiful as I expected. The price is quite steep and I wouldn't buy it again, but my daughter saw it and fell in love. I've seen similar dolls for half or less than half this price so I feel a bit ripped off, but my daughter (3 years old) really loves her and the short hair is easier to take care of than some other dolls.
customer_reviews.author: neurogeekTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good first American Girl doll for a pre-schooler
customer_reviews.text: We bought Camille for our 5 year old granddaughter for Christmas. We wanted her to have an American Girl doll but not a full-size one yet so this was perfect. This doll is just as cute as she looks and I'm sure our granddaughter will now be hooked on American Girl!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Keiffer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Leg $$$ 😪
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yo daughter fell in love with Camille the moment she saw her. Camille was her new side kick everywhere we went. She braided her hair, put her to bed each night, and carried her everywhere. But, her heart was shattered when Camille’s leg broke in less than two weeks! There wasn’t any unusual or forceful play. It is a very poorly made doll. And a total shock to me because I paid so much for it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: LEG SNAPPED OFF! - and it wasn’t my kid’s fault
customer_reviews.text: So today while playing with my daughter I (not a child!) sat this doll down and her leg popped right off. The plastic holding her “joint” in completely cracked into multiple shards leaving a gaping whole and making it impossible to reattach her leg. HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED seeing as though this was not a cheap purchase and I made it assuming this was a quality toy that would last! My daughter is absolutely HEART BROKEN because this was her favorite doll and with everything going on in the world right now she definitely didn’t need another disappointment in her life. I will never purchase another American Girl product after this.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Came in time and in good condition. Wish I had read the measurements though ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in time and in good condition. Wish I had read the measurements though lol. This doll is much smaller than the original American girl dolls! I didn't know they came in two different sizes now. Still happy with purchase though. My daughter loves how cute the doll is and I'm glad that there are matching outfits for this type of doll as well. Really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had Camille for around a week. This morning she was moving her arms to change her outfit (not roughly, I was sitting right there) and the doll’s shoulder cracked. I’m really disappointed in the quality. Not what I expected for the price at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Broken already!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic in the leg joint is so flimsy, it just snapped with normal play. I'm so disgusted. Don't waste your money on a Wellie Wisher, you're halfway to a full size AG doll that's better quality. Such a total waste that Camille cannot be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Jane of All Trades

customer_reviews.title: The doll sizes are perfect for my six year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are very cute and were a big hit on Christmas morning. The doll sizes are perfect for my six year old daughter, though she was quick to point out that these are not the true American Girl dolls (they are Wellie Wishers), but that did not stop her from spending hours playing with the dolls and changing their outfits every ten minutes for different "events."
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doll....smaller than 18" ones but perfect for a younger child....prettier than the larger ones (in my opinion anyway) ....not so bulky in the shoulders. The hair is standing the test of my 5 year old quite well. It takes the love and brushing well and still looks great...no frizzing.
customer_reviews.author: j r

customer_reviews.title: Not worth free shipping and product defective
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this doll Dec 2019. This morning, I set the doll to “sit” so my four year old could comb her hair and the leg cracked and popped off. I question if this is a true American Girl doll or a knock off as the plastic seems thin and has rattled since we first received this product. This doll was in no way was being mishandled and just became completely unusable with light use. Buyer beware: purchase from the actual American Doll store and not this site! I originally purchased this as a gift as shipping was expidited and free through Prime. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: This doll broke after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift purchased on December 7, 2019 for my 10 year old daughter. It broke after 4 months as she was playing with her Camille doll. The leg broke off and we cannot easily repair it. I would like information on how to have the doll replaced. My daughter is so sad and disappointed. I expected better craftsmanship and quality from American Girl. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: liam miles

customer_reviews.title: Buyers do not buy this doll - This doll will not sit - legs will break off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this doll just over a month ago for my daughter for xmas - She opened and went to move the legs in a sitting position the leg completely disconnected and now is broken - No way to attach the leg back on - obviously this doll is not made for kids it is too fragile and very poor quality for over $60 I am so disappointed this doll lasted literally one day. And not I can't return it because I bought it a head of time for a gift... So very very disappointing -
customer_reviews.author: amber miller

customer_reviews.title: Broken leg!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this doll for Christmas 2018. She has played with her on and off for the past year, but definitely not everyday or roughly. Just tonight she picked her up to play for a bit and we heard something jiggling inside of the doll. A few minutes later, her leg popped off. My daughter is so upset. I just started looking at the reviews and see this appears to be a common problem. So disappointing considering the price! Now seeing so many other reviews with the same problem, I would not recommend this doll.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Gal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Gave my granddaughter this for Christmas. Her leg has already fallen off several times. Bought Wella last year and she is still perfect. Return window is closed. That's a bummer for what she cost.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Possible defect in the Camille dolls
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 Wellie Wisher dolls for my Granddaughters for Christmas last year and BOTH of the Camille doll’s had a leg to break off. So I had to buy 2 more this year. This is weird and unacceptable. The other dolls are fine. Something is defective with the Camille doll though.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: not well made
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter 7 yrs. old has so many babies she plays with....unfortunately one of her legs broke off........it's not that she plays everyday with this particular baby doll and she certainly is not ruff with them she's a good little mommy.......she is heartbroken that her leg broke off.........if there was a way to contact the company with a complaint I certainly would do that.... Nana..........
customer_reviews.author: j. fisher

customer_reviews.title: Broken leg Welly Wisher
customer_reviews.text: My 5 years old got her Camille Doll for Christmas and have been playing with it since then and his in love with it since then. Unfortunately yesterday, when she was playing and trying to remove the dolls boots, the leg broke. And a piece of plastic broke as well - so I can’t fix it (or pretend that nothing happened). I saw this happening also to other customers... have you been able to fix it? Is there any warranty/guarantee? Would Amazon customer service helped? (I ordered via Amazon because it saved me a trip to the American Girl Doll store in NYC). Would love to get anyone feedback. Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Roy Lombourg

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 yr old for Christmas, she loved the doll so much it had to be with her 24/7. My daughter babied her doll and after a few months of gentle use the plastic broke off and now she has no leg and it can’t be put back together. For $60 this doll should be really sturdy and not break like this. My girl cried so hard when the leg fell off
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a little girl about 5 yrs of age. Her hands could take on/off the clothing and immediately requested additional accessories. The reason for the 4 rating instead of the 5 is because accessories were limited. I ended up knitting a coat, hat and scarf and sewed a sleeping bag for the doll. It would have been nice if those accessories were available.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: a good doll by comparison
customer_reviews.text: The doll is a good doll for younger kids. Comparing her with heart to heart dolls, my favorite dolls, this doll has a head that is secure to the body, not held on by rubber band like heart to heart seems. She has a full set of hair, unlike heart to heart, and a younger girl can really tug at her to get her clothes off and on without a parent worrying that the doll will be ruined. That's what I was looking for, for my daughter. If that makes it twenty dollars more expensive to have then I guess that's what makes the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bailey

customer_reviews.title: She's Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: ...And she is quality. My daughter has some very inexpensive, and the difference is massive. These dolls may be a bit higher price but I'm expecting this to last her a long time. And the clothes you can get on Amazon for this size doll fit like they were made for her. The Youtube series and books that go with this make it even more fun. My 3 year old has a new favorite, and she's never liked a doll this much. She dresses it for work and makes sure it has its PJs every night, "brushes" her teeth and sleeps with her.
customer_reviews.author: Firelight27

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Came much sooner than the projected 1-2 months... I think we got it within a few weeks. Perfect for my daughter. This is a smaller American Girl doll though - 14.5" instead of 18".
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for my two year old
customer_reviews.text: We bought this doll for our two year old daughter for Christmas. She absolutely adores it. The doll is delicate and beautiful. Its silky shiny hair was carefully wrapped with net when we opened it. Very well-thought move. The only thing is that the doll comes with a hair clip that is not in good quality and the hair clip broke minutes after my daughter played with it. She ends up using her own cute hair clips on the doll. Overall I like this doll and I recommend it as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are not even close to the quality of the full size American Girl dolls. This broke after only two months. We missed the return window by a few days. My daughter is so sad. She took good care of the doll and it broke during normal play trying to have the doll sit in a chair. Very cute doll, she loves the show, but not worth the money if it breaks in a matter of a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Cute but don’t think it will last
customer_reviews.text: Cute doll, although within 24 hours the paint was chipping off the boots, with minimal play. Also, the little hair clip is garbage, all but broken the first day, too. American girl wants to charge a lot for their products, but they don’t hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Cmj0319

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my step daughter so I didnt actually see it out of box until Christmas day. These WellieWishers are smaller than the original American Girl Dolls. I had a American Girl Doll as a child and for smaller hands, I'm a much bigger fan of thess WellieWisher dolls. Plus, they're gorgeous and great quality. The hair on these dolls is much better than the original AGD. I plan on purchasing my daughter one next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Yost

customer_reviews.title: A Four Year Olds Dream!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been eyeing this doll at the American Doll store for over a year. When my mom asked me what to get her for Christmas I knew this would be the perfect gift. This doll is a lot less expensive than the traditional American Girl Dolls and you can order lots of clothes and accessories on Amazon which my mother-in-law did for her gift. My daughter looks like this doll and absoluetly loves it! Best Christmas gift every!
customer_reviews.author: YardMaven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my little one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doll for my daughter who is almost 2. The 20 inch dolls seemed too big for her to play with at this stange. I'm so happy I went with the smaller doll. The WellieWishers are high quality American Girl Dolls just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Wellie Wishers will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third purchase of the Wellie Wishers collection. Absolutely love them! Camille is no exception. Budget friendly at 60.00 and will provide your child with hours if imaginative play. You can also purchased books and accessories separatly, which we have and love. A great addition to out American Girl collection. Would recommend and buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Huddy

customer_reviews.title: Shes adorable
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it, but it seems cheaply made for the price we paid..her leg was a little loose . Still i ordered another and returned this one ,because she loves it so much..
customer_reviews.author: Chaya E

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter since her sister had one. The doll itself is well made. Will I understand why it costs so much for a doll? No. However it made my daughter extremely happy so no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Kidd

customer_reviews.title: A very sweet little doll
customer_reviews.text: A very sweet little doll, like the baby sister to the full size American girl doll. My 6 year old granddaughter just loves her.
customer_reviews.author: c.

customer_reviews.title: Quality not worth price
customer_reviews.text: I had AG dolls growing up and loved them. I ordered this Wellie Wisher for my 3 year old daughter and was immediately disappointed in the quality. The hair is nice and silky, but the face and plastic just seem cheap and not at all comparable to the classic AG dolls. Fast forward a couple months, this doll has hardly been played with and one of her legs just came off. I wouldn't recommend this doll.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: I love the hair
customer_reviews.text: This doll is perfect for a little girls first American Girl Doll, the size is good and her hair is great. We have pulled this doll from the bottom of the toy chest and her hair was still perfect. In my opinion, it's worth the money ($59.00) because of the hair, although I do think it's overpriced, that's why I only gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Coco

customer_reviews.title: Small and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Cute doll but not as much detail as I would’ve expected from American Girl. My daughter was happy with it tho. I will say the hair is nicely done. Just be aware it’s much smaller than their regular collection but I was aware of that when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Legs break easily
customer_reviews.text: I love American dolls. Had to buy second doll because legs broke on first doll within a week and granddaughter was heartbroken. Poor quality on movement of legs. Very unforgiving. I would purchase other American girl dolls but NOT Wellie Wishers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Broken leg right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Doll came with a broken leg attachment point and a broken hair clip right out of the box! My 6 year old was extremely disappointed after waiting a week for this item!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Overall a super cute doll, perfect for a younger child since its smaller than the standard American Girl dolls. I actually think it fits into the 18in doll accessories like the cars and campers better than the big ones. Gave 4 stars because of the hair. It's so uneven and drives me crazy. American Girl wont help since I ordered from Amazon and I'm passed my limit to return so I guess I'm stuck with it. A friend got her little girl the same one and ordered it from AG and hers is fine, which makes me wonder where this one actually came from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4, we gave this to her as a present, and she absolutely LOVES it! She takes her everywhere and sleeps with her every night! I am very happy with the 14 inch size, I think it is better than the 18 inch size. I think 18 inches would be a bit too big for a 4 year old. She loves this doll and I will look into buying the others soon:)
customer_reviews.author: Emma Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll is beautiful. The quality is what you'd expect from American Girl. I do think they're expensive, but the dolls last and my daughters love them. The clothes are great quality and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Sims

customer_reviews.title: Expensive plastic
customer_reviews.text: The doll is great and my niece loved it. The doll itself is worthy of 5 stars I guess. But there is no reason for a doll to cost this much. It's just plastic. Perhaps it's unfair to knock off two stars for price given that I agreed to the price when I purchased it. If you feel this way I won't argue with you because I did agree at the time of checkout. But let's just be honest here and not lose sight of the fact there is no reason a doll should cost this much.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny S

customer_reviews.title: Six-year-old granddaughter loves this doll!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved her doll! I love that were able to order on Amazon and have them shipped to Oregon! It sure makes being a grandparent easier these days!
customer_reviews.author: JeanieJ

customer_reviews.title: Significantly smaller than the original dolls
customer_reviews.text: As a father really want to surprise my daughter with this gift but the real deal is this doll is significantly smaller than the original dolls. So if you buy this be ready to have your kid disappointed, or you need to tell them is not the original.
customer_reviews.author: Sebas Lancome

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend even though it's a cute doll.
customer_reviews.text: The doll itself is beautiful and my daughter loves it. The problem is the leg just fell off for the second time in less than two months. She got the doll Christmas day. It will not reattach. American girl only replaces dolls they sell not this one even though the cost is the same on both sides. If you want to Try a wellie wisher buy direct from the American Girl website and avoid the drama if the doll breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Fishel

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality of material
customer_reviews.text: After 6 month one leg of both dolls I purchased break and came out from the body I can’t do anything since I didn’t purchase it with American girl official shop and amazon didn’t help me!
customer_reviews.author: Andres Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: I highly doubt this is an “American Girl Doll”
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I like about this doll is that it arrived on time. Other than that this supposed “American Girl Doll” is much smaller than my daughter’s first “American Girl Doll”, which my daughter noticed right away. But the worse thing is there is some loose broken pieces of something rattling around inside the doll, which my daughter also noticed right away. Very disappointed. IMO this doll is not worth the price charged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dolly keeps breaking
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th doll that has a broken leg. You would have to use it for decoration and never touch it in order to keep the leg on. Or maybe it will break anyway?. It has been more than 30 days so I can't even return it. I don't even know if the American Girl store would fix it since I bought it through amazon. Horrible product and probably not authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Snavej

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doll. My daughter is working on collecting all five WellieWisher dolls, and Camille was her second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ABMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my daughters 8th birthday. It shipped in one day and came in perfect condition! It came in the American Girl Doll box so I know it’s not fake. We can’t wait to give it to her!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Heiser

customer_reviews.title: This doll's leg broke during normal play
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this doll for Christmas but after about 1 month, the leg broke off. My daughter is very careful with her toys and was not being overly rough with the doll. I am extremely disappointed in the quality of this doll. I expected more from American Girl.
customer_reviews.author: Danna Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Something is rattling/rolling around inside:
customer_reviews.text: Something is rolling around inside the doll but my daughter doesn’t want to return her so I guess we’re stuck with it :/
customer_reviews.author: Bock Bock

customer_reviews.title: Easily breaks! Less than a month
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this doll for Christmas and loved it. The arm just broke off with no force at all and doesn’t seem as if we can reattach it. My daughter is crushed
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Really beautifully made doll
customer_reviews.text: Really beautifully made doll, my daughter loves it and having had American Girl doll's before, having short hair really helps keep it from getting tangled and knotted. She enjoys it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: So cute and great quality.There are a lot of different brands you can mix and match accessories with as well, like the Generation dolls at Target..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: If the kid loves them they are a perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my stepdaughter to piss off her mom my X and because my stepdaughter wanted it
customer_reviews.author: Justin Snelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves her dolly so much she got her hair cut to match the American Girl doll!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McLane

customer_reviews.title: The doll is adorable as expected
customer_reviews.text: The doll is adorable as expected! Only issue is figuring out the hair clip but this is my daughter's favorite Wellie out of the 4 she has.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: We got this Wellie Wisher for our little granddaughter to complete her final collection of Wellie Wisher Dolls. She's so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: broken leg
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year for my daughter and it's leg broke. For the price you would think that the quality would be decent and the doll would hold up at least a year. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G

customer_reviews.title: This Wellie Wisher doll
customer_reviews.text: The doll arrived in a large secure box, but was in its original doll box. Shipped quickly. No damage to the doll or her presentation box. Great service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kare-wengl

customer_reviews.title: No 18 inches = 14,5 inches
customer_reviews.text: The doll is perfect te problem is that in Amazon it says 18 inches but it is not. It is smaller 14,5 inches my kids is so furious because the Santa is not a good person 😡
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Lovely doll
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful high-quality doll, fast shipping and good transaction. My daughter was thrilled with Camille and her dress and hair are very pretty. Glad I could get it through Amazon Prime with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: CWOK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $$
customer_reviews.text: Leg broke off, sent doll to the American doll hospital and same thing happened after we got her back. Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Goele Distelmans

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little American Girl doll.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my five year old grand daughter and she loves it! The WellyWisher dolls are a little smaller than the "regular" American Girl dolls, but the quality is just as good. The size of this doll is very well suited for a smaller child and easier to cuddle and play with.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my neicr
customer_reviews.text: I gave this doll to my 4 year old niece and she absolutely adored it. Great quality and super cute doll.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Patton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful doll. Its for my 5 year old. She wanted Camille because it looks like her and it didnt disappoint. It arrived quickly and in good condition. Cant wait to give it my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Doll
customer_reviews.text: My daughter calls her 'Princess.' She's a very beautiful doll. She seems to be a quality made doll. I love that unlike the knockoff AG dolls, Camille actually looks like a little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Much Loved Doll
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves this doll. Camille’s hair seems to remain in better shape, after many, many combings and varied hairdos, than some of the other Wellie Wishers.
customer_reviews.author: Greta McNamara

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful alternative for younger girls
customer_reviews.text: I love that American Girl has this option. Not only is it a great size for the younger girls, it’s a more affordable option for parents and grandparents. My granddaughter loves it. We purchased the book too.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stovall waltman

customer_reviews.title: Doll
customer_reviews.text: I got this doll for my granddaughters birthday. She said that she absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: lmcg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Doll
customer_reviews.text: Camille is a well made doll, pretty. Our 4 year old granddaughter was smitten and takes the doll nearly everywhere. Her mom was also taken with this doll, almost as much as her daughter! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: just_stell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll
customer_reviews.text: I thought she was so cute but had to return because I bought the wrong one and the little girl who was to receive it wanted another. I almost kept it for myself and hated to send her on her way!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Howard

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This gift was bought for christmas but 5 months later i has broken. The leg articulation broke. Is there any grarantee? Too much money in a toy for braking like this... I don't even find where to complain here...
customer_reviews.author: Flavio Horovitz

customer_reviews.title: legs break off
customer_reviews.text: We've bought 2 of these dolls for my daughter for her birthday and both of them have had the legs break off in less than a month. They are junk. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: American Girl couldn't possibly disappoint! These dolls are beautifully made. My daughter LOVES her doll.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas and she squealed with delight when she opened it.
customer_reviews.author: LEE

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll! The legs seem a little stiff...not sure if that is how all of these dolls are or if it is just this one? Either way, quality and real American Girl Welliewisher doll. Came in American Girl packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Angela P.

customer_reviews.title: Great First American Girl Doll
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this pretty doll and takes it everywhere with her. Great first American Girl doll!
customer_reviews.author: LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Nice Doll
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll. She looks great, everything works as expected, and my daughter babies her. Cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick J Gebhard

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved this gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this !! Didn’t realize it was smaller than standard American girl doll, but not a big deal to us.
customer_reviews.author: Brae

customer_reviews.title: Giftsbke
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old girl ‘s smile when opening was the epitome at Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Sturm

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our five year old daughter for Christmas. She loves it! We wanted an American girl doll that our five year old could take out and play with and this version of the doll is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Annunzio

customer_reviews.title: Great Doll
customer_reviews.text: Great doll, my daughter just had to have one after her cousin got one. I'm sure this will not be the last one of these we buy.
customer_reviews.author: AKM

customer_reviews.title: Play carefully
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice doll we have 3 of the Wellie Wishers from the AG store an 2 here but the 2 from amazon for some reason the right legs both popped out. I put them back in but it's not the same and keeps coming out again. I unfortunately had return them .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An adorable doll worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This doll is adorable! My daughter absolutely loves her. The packaging is pretty, and she is very durable. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this doll for my son and DILs niece for Christmas. She had been asking for an American Girl doll and was just thrilled with this one. She will be 8 on her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great Doll
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for grand daughter's birthday and it arrived as arranged and was as described. Grand daughter loved her gift and thinks her GP is the best...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beaven

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was going to be the 18" but that's on me for not fully reading the description
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: American girl
customer_reviews.text: Lovely doll. There must be different sizes of American girl,,,, bought shoes for her,,,, way to big,,,, yet stated for a American Girl
customer_reviews.author: angelface

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and details
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Easter 2017 and now it’s October 2018 and it is still in great shape. My preschooler loves Camille and it has been played with and even been in the water. Wonderful doll with exceptional quality.
customer_reviews.author: kit_zee

customer_reviews.title: Excited Little Girl
customer_reviews.text: Cailyn was so excited to get her birthday gift. She has several American Girl dolls. She said the other girls (her dolls) love their little sister.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Expensive!!???
customer_reviews.text: Cool doll, not worth the money, but we live in a material world.
customer_reviews.author: JP Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cute Doll but Bad Paint Job Around Her Eyes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's 4th birthday. It arrived quickly but the dolls eyes were not symmetrical and the paint was splotchy and missing in some spots in her lashes. I ordered a replacement so hopefully that one comes in the quality I would expect from American Girl.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Doll
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my grand daughters 6th birthday. She loves it. The colors are very bright & her hair is beautiful. So glad I got it for her.
customer_reviews.author: sarah mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: Good doll for little girls
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it of course its an American Girl doll
customer_reviews.author: David Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Broken leg
customer_reviews.text: So sad my daughter had for a very short time ( she is 9 and very careful with her stuff) and the leg broke off. It was a gift from her older brother. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy P.

customer_reviews.title: My best friend
customer_reviews.text: Camille has become one of my granddaughters favorites. She loves her short hair and the boots are really cool.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the doll! An adorable addition to her American girl doll collection
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: American Girl WellieWishers Camille Doll
product_meta.description: Camille adores the ocean-and she's Mellow as a mermaid. She's the one her friends turn to when they need someone to listen. This 14.5" (36.8 cm) doll is sized just right for younger girls. She has blue eyes, a freckle on one cheek, and silky blond hair that can be Brushed and styled. Plastic/vinyl. Includes: a deep-blue tee with glittery mesh ruffles, a tie-dye print skirt with a handkerchief hem, a glittery mesh layer on top, and a bow at the waistband, a coral starfish clip for her hair, light-pink underwear, blue wellie boots with red fins and smiley fish faces.
feature_bullets: Camille adores the ocean-and she's mellow as a mermaid
She's the one her friends turn to when they need someone to listen. A tie-dye print skirt with a handkerchief hem, a glittery mesh layer on top, and a bow at the waistband
This 14.5" (36.8 cm) doll is sized just right for younger girls
She has blue eyes, a freckle on one cheek, and silky blond hair that can be brushed and styled
Collect all of your favorite welliewishers!
